name: Color Balls Go
description:
Color Balls is a new addictive racing game. Roll your ball and tap to change its color in order to pass through the colored walls. Only when the ball switches to the same color of the wall, it can go through successfully.

How to play?
-- Tap the screen to switch the ball color
-- Rush through the walls with the same color ball.
-- Challenge your score and compete with players all over the world!

Game Features:
-- Stunning 3D animation
-- Unique racing gameplay combined with color race
-- Multiple levels to challenge
-- Variety of skins and balls for choice
-- Totally Free! No network needed!

Perfect game for players who love endless parkour style and fast-paced action games! Download it now and have fun!
